bookables.title: Meeting Room
bookables.notes: The one with the big table and interactive screen. Seats 12. See Colin if you need the tea and coffee trolley.

bookables.title: Lecture Hall
bookables.notes: For more formal 'sage-on-the-stage' presentations. Seats 100. See Sandra for help with AV setup.

bookables.title: Games Room
bookables.notes: Table tennis, table football, pinball! There's also a selection of board games. Please tidy up!

bookables.title: Lounge
bookables.notes: A relaxing place to hang out. Ideal for bean bag wranglers and sofa surfers. Help yourself to a beer after hours.

bookables.title: Projector
bookables.notes: Portable but powerful. Keep it with the case. Be careful, it gets quite hot after a while!

bookables.title: Wireless mics
bookables.notes: Really handy but don't forget to switch them off when you pop out of the room.

users.name: Mark
users.title: Envisioning Sculptor
users.notes: With the company for 15 years, Mark has consistently sculpted innovative and compelling narratives for enforwarding the mutual ethos of all stakeholders.

users.name: Simon
users.title: Outreach Samurai
users.notes: Simon wrangles social networks, elegantly employing bleeding-katana psycho-tools to leverage what he likes to call 'News Technology'.

users.name: Clarisse
users.title: Quantum Explorator
users.notes: Surfing a higher plane of understanding, Clarisse value-adds the latest 'beyond fullstack' platforms, libraries and universes, collapsing realities to find the one truth.

users.name: Sanjiv
users.title: Devil's Advocate Advocate
users.notes: Sanjiv lives your life to better understand your power-tantrums and architect empathic growth journeys that break the shell and distribute the yoke company-wide.
